history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or walking directions
USER walking
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you walking directions in mobility mode. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Allegheny County Courthouse
TTS Okay, going to allegheny county courthouse. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER Pittsburgh Paints Arena
TTS Okay, leaving from ppg paints arena. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:41 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER yes, please.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the route in <break time='500ms'/>  Blind or Visually Impaired mode, to hear the routes in <break time='500ms'/>  Sighted and Walking mode, please say <break strength='weak'/> ALTERNATE ROUTE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Start at PPG Paints Arena. Go west on 5TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Bear right on ROSS STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER alternate route

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the route in <break time='500ms'/>  Sighted and Walking mode, to hear the routes in <break time='500ms'/>  Blind or Visually Impaired mode, please say <break strength='weak'/> ALTERNATE ROUTE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Start at PPG Paints Arena. Go west on 5TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left on 6TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Bear right on 5TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue on 6TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER proceed
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right on 5TH AVENUE, and then cross the street on <break strength='strong'/>6TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER proceed
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left on ROSS STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Finish at Allegheny County Courthouse, your destination will be on the right </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
